content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for coming to see the apartment. What is your budget for the rental price?
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: My budget is 700 Euros per month. But I can negotiate. Do you have any other properties available?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, we have a few other properties available that may fit within your budget. Would you be interested in seeing them?
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: Yes, I would love to see them. Can you give me an idea of what they are like?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Certainly. One property we have is a one-bedroom apartment that is 15 square meters in size and is located in a convenient area of the city. It is available for 650 Euros per month. Another property we have is a two-bedroom apartment that is 20 square meters in size and is located in a quiet neighborhood. It is available for 700 Euros per month. Lastly, we have a studio apartment that is 10 square meters in size and is located in the heart of the city. It is available for 600 Euros per month. Which one would you be interested in seeing?
name: Ryanah Rahman
